org.qbroker.jms

Class TConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.jms.JMSTConnector
      • org.qbroker.jms.TConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.jms.ExceptionListener, TopicConnector

    public class TConnector
extends JMSTConnector
    TConnector connects to a JMS topic and initializes one of the operations, such as sub, pub, DeregSub and RegSub.

    For durable subscriptions, you have to specify SubscriptionID. On the other hand, if SubscriptionID is defined, it is assumed to be durable subscription.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
